abilityEffect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Yanmega is your Active Pok√©mon, you may search your discard pile for a [G] Energy card and attach it to Yanmega. This power can't be used if Yanmega is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: You may return all [G] Energy attached to Yanmega to your hand. If you do, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you returned.
